mapper.select: SELECT s.* FROM sub_category_with_goods_details as s join (SELECT t.* FROM tb_newbee_mall_goods_info as t join tb_newbee_mall_goods_category as c on t.goods_category_id=c.category_id where c.category_id=#{categoryId} or c.category_id in (SELECT c2.category_id FROM tb_newbee_mall_goods_category as c join tb_newbee_mall_goods_category as c2 on c.category_id=c2.parent_id where c.category_id=#{categoryId})) as i on s.goods_id=i.goods_id order by s.col_name,s.col;
